turns.utterance: Do you like to travel? I love travelling bu train and airplane!
turns.response: I like to travel as well but i'm kind of scared of flying :)

turns.utterance: you shouldn't be! It's very safe. It's funny that term travel may originate from the old french word travail which means work
turns.response: that makes no sense lol i know people travel for work but i associate travelling with vacation

turns.utterance: I know, I feel the same way! What is your favorite destination? I'm going to Kazakhstan in 2.5 weeks and i can't wait!!
turns.response: cool, I've heard about Kazakhstan but I'm not sure I know where it is located. My favorite destination is Bahamas

turns.utterance: Kazakhstan located in Central Asia (right under Russia), it's a post soviet union country AND is the world's largest landlocked country and ninth largest in the world
turns.response: wow, I'm embarrassed i didn't know it. I bet it's cold down there

turns.utterance: during winter it is! It starts snowing on november and it doesn't melt until like late April. Kazakhstan has vast mineral resources. Great country!
turns.response: Brrrr, too much snow. I'm from the South and I'm not used to snow at all. I hate hot weather but I don't like cold weather either

annotation.comment: the systems is scared to fly and users says it shouldnt be... might be a correction
